biotools.summary: RENANO is a reference-based lossless FASTQ data compressor, specifically tailored to compress FASTQ files generated with nanopore sequencing technologies. RENANO improves on its state of the art predecessor ENANO, by providing a more efficient base call sequence compression component. Two compression algorithms are introduced, corresponding to the following scenarios: (1) a reference genome is available without cost to both the compressor and the decompressor; (2) the reference genome is available only on the compressor side, and a compacted version of the reference is included in the compressed file.

bioschemas.name: RENANO
